about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 177: OSR Classic Monsters

OSR Classic Monsters contains tokens matching the entries for the OSR and  BX monster list. This pack contains a mixture of older tokens found in other  packs. If you have already been collecting my tokens please buy the OSR  New Monsters pack, it contains the new monsters I made to fill in the gaps.

detailed_description:
"

Devin Night Pack 177: OSR Classic Monsters

OSR Classic Monsters contains tokens matching the entries for the OSR and  BX monster list. This pack contains a mixture of older tokens found in other  packs.
